description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[A new geographical, historical, and commercial grammar; and present state of the several kingdoms of the world ... The astronomical part by James Ferguson, F.R.S., to which have been added the late discoveries of Dr. Herschel ... Illustrated with a correct set of maps, engraved from the most recent observations and draughts of geographical travellers. The twentieth edition, corrected and considerably enlarged.]" Author: GUTHRIE, William - of Brechin Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10002.ee.32." Page: 83 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1827 Edition: Twenty-fourth edition ... corrected. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001547986 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
